title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Derek Stenning
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 177 – June 2021 Cover Art Companion Derek Stenning is a concept artist working in the game development field. His personal work, Entartete Kunst (EK), is available as prints and resin model kits. His second art book, EK2 - The Lost Years, is to be published in 2022 by Design Studio Press. ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.

Issue 177 – June 2021
Cover Art
Companion
Derek Stenning is a concept artist working in the game development field. His personal work, Entartete Kunst (EK), is available as prints and resin model kits. His second art book, EK2 - The Lost Years, is to be published in 2022 by Design Studio Press.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Companion by Derek Stenning
